thread.title: Germany examines cases resembling US, UK warnings on Russia cyber attacks

title: Germany examines cases resembling US, UK warnings on Russia cyber attacks
text:
April 17, 2018 / 1:25 PM / Updated an hour ago Germany examines cases resembling US, UK warnings on Russia cyber attacks Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BERLIN (Reuters) - Germany’s BSI cyber protection agency is examining specific cases in Germany which resemble methods highlighted by the United States and Britain in warnings about Russian cyber attacks, it said on Tuesday. 
“Concrete incidents in Germany, whose methods strongly resemble those pointed to by the United States and United Kingdom are known to the BSI,” it said in a statement, adding it had analysed the cases, informed the relevant organizations and initiated action via the national cyber defence centre. Reporting by Andrea Shalal; Writing by Madeline Chambers; Editing by Michael Nienaber
